pageContext.claim: “The [Mueller team] spent more than $30 million, hundreds of interviews of people, in some cases very innocent people that were put through the ringer.”
pageContext.analysis: Reports show the total cost of the Mueller investigation through September 2018 was $25.2 million. But the special counsel’s office has become a moneymaker as much as a money-loser because Mueller through asset forfeiture has seized properties and funds from Paul Manafort. Independent journalist Marcy Wheeler has estimated the value of Manafort’s seized assets at $46 million, or nearly twice the known cost of Mueller’s investigation so far.
